title: Register domain so a url can open an application
body: I would like to register a url with my application so that when someone clicks http://www.mydomain.com/ in the browser or is redirected to the browser from another application they are given the option to open my application instead of the browser. With default options etc...

comments.body: This is more then useful. Sure, it should ask if the browser or my app is used for this link. Nobody in the world sends me WP links, they all send me links to websites, where I usually don't have a way to open the specific object in my specialized app. This is really annoying and would be so easy to implement. Also there is no security issue, if WP asks which app I want to use (browser or app). Maybe there should be a "Remember my decision" option.
